trans-unit.source: Table of atomized string objects.
trans-unit.target: 原子化字串物件的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Several classes, such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, use the `XmlNameTable` class internally to store attribute and element names.
trans-unit.target: 數個類別，例如<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>，使用`XmlNameTable`類別在內部用來儲存屬性和元素的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When an element or attribute name occurs multiple times in an XML document, it is stored only once in the `XmlNameTable`.
trans-unit.target: 當項目或屬性名稱在 XML 文件中出現多次時，它只會在 `XmlNameTable` 中儲存一次。

trans-unit.source: The names are stored as common language runtime (CLR) object types.
trans-unit.target: 這些名稱會儲存為 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 物件型別。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to do object comparisons on these strings rather than a more expensive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您對這些字串進行物件比較，而不需要更耗費資源的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: These string objects are referred to as "atomized strings".
trans-unit.target: 這些字串物件稱為 「 原子化字串 >。

trans-unit.source: `XmlNameTable` is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.NameTable> class.
trans-unit.target: `XmlNameTable` 中實作<xref:System.Xml.NameTable>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two element names.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比較兩個項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, atomizes the specified string and adds it to the <see langword="XmlNameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，原子化指定的字串，並將它加入至 <see langword="XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>。

trans-unit.source: The name to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, atomizes the specified string and adds it to the <see langword="XmlNameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，原子化指定的字串，並將它加入至 <see langword="XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The new atomized string or the existing one if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 新的原子化字串或已經存在的現有原子化字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The character array containing the name to add.
trans-unit.target: 字元陣列，包含要加入的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Zero-based index into the array specifying the first character of the name.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零起始的索引，指定名稱的第一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the name.
trans-unit.target: 名稱中字元的數目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, atomizes the specified string and adds it to the <see langword="XmlNameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，原子化指定的字串，並將它加入至 <see langword="XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The new atomized string or the existing one if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 新的原子化字串或已經存在的現有原子化字串。

trans-unit.source: If length is zero, String.Empty is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果長度為零，則傳回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>。

trans-unit.source: 0 > <paramref name="offset" />
trans-unit.target: 0 > <paramref name="offset" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> >= <paramref name="array" />.Length
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> >= <paramref name="array" />.Length

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> > <paramref name="array" />.Length
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> > <paramref name="array" />.Length

trans-unit.source: The above conditions do not cause an exception to be thrown if <paramref name="length" /> =0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="length" /> =0，上述條件就不會造成例外狀況擲回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> < 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> < 0。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the atomized string.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得原子化字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>。

trans-unit.source: The name to look up.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the atomized string containing the same value as the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得包含相同值的原子化字串做為指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: The atomized string or <see langword="null" /> if the string has not already been atomized.
trans-unit.target: 原子化字串，如果字串尚未原子化，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The character array containing the name to look up.
trans-unit.target: 字元陣列，包含要查詢的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index into the array specifying the first character of the name.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零起始的索引，指定名稱的第一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the name.
trans-unit.target: 名稱中字元的數目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the atomized string containing the same characters as the specified range of characters in the given array.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得包含相同字元的原子化字串做為指定陣列中的指定字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: The atomized string or <see langword="null" /> if the string has not already been atomized.
trans-unit.target: 原子化字串，如果字串尚未原子化，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="length" /> is zero, String.Empty is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="length" /> 為零，則會傳回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>。

trans-unit.source: 0 > <paramref name="offset" />
trans-unit.target: 0 > <paramref name="offset" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> >= <paramref name="array" />.Length
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> >= <paramref name="array" />.Length

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="length" /> > <paramref name="array" />.Length
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> > <paramref name="array" />.Length

trans-unit.source: The above conditions do not cause an exception to be thrown if <paramref name="length" /> =0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="length" /> =0，上述條件就不會造成例外狀況擲回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> < 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> < 0。
